entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
